hints.content:
The number line shows $\maroonD{7}$ equal jumps of $\blueD{5}$ units.

![The same number line with each arrow labeled, plus 5](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/831810c6b93ff6a29f8d0dbfa6aab17e848a9658)

options.explanation:
$\maroonD{7}\times\blueD{5}=\maroonD{7}\blueD{\text{ fives}}$.

That's the same as $\maroonD{5}\blueD{\text{ fives}}+\maroonD{2}\blueD{\text{ fives}}$.

![The same number line with a brace spanning the first 5 arrows labeled, 5 fives, and a brace spanning the other 2 arrows labeled, 2 fives](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fbae38daee33acb33e7ea673467b1624fcae3813)

$\redD{25}+\purpleC{10}=\greenD{35}$

So $\maroonD{7}\times\blueD{5}=\greenD{35}$.

question.content:
**Multiply.**  
*Hint: Use the number line below to help solve the equation.* 

$7 \times 5 = $ [[☃ numeric-input 1]]
